BBC bosses to meet police TODAY after corporation suspends top presenter who 'paid teenager £35K for explicit photos' - as it emerges he 'phoned the youngster twice when he was exposed and said: 'What have you done?''
10/07/23 06:15
The unnamed broadcaster has finally been suspended by the corporation almost two months after a complaint was first made by the alleged victim's family. It came as the 'well-known' star allegedly phoned the youngster after he was exposed last week. He reportedly demanded 'what have you done?' in the call and also asked his alleged victim to ring their mother to persuade her to 'stop the investigation' as he began to panic.
